TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpServerUtilityWrapper extends System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that provides helper methods for processing Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class. This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class while also exposing the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase> type. The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase> class enables you to replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `writer` object. For an example, see <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityWrapper.Execute%2A>.
